creator: tomek@jot23.org
text: I include patch file with Polish version of HTTP error messages.

creator: tomek@jot23.org
text:
Created attachment 9338
Polish HTTP error messages

creator: slive@apache.org
text:
Thanks.  Given that members of the docs project don't speak Polish,
we need to have someone review the accuracy of this translation before
we can commit it.

If you could recruit another fluent Polish speaker to read your
translation, assure that it matches the English original, and then
post a message here to that effect, then we can commit your translation.

creator: tomek@jot23.org
text:
Created attachment 9355
Spelling and content corrections for Polish error messages
Translation looks fine & matches the original
creator: juczar@3net.pl
trawick@apache.org
text:
Your second patch has been committed to Apache httpd 2.1-dev, and I'll request
that it be merged into the stable branch for the 2.0.next release.

Thanks for your contribution, and thanks for using Apache.
